alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 18 at 6:40PM EST until November 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. Lake effect snow will move north across the Metro Area late tonight and Saturday morning. There will then be a break in the snow Saturday afternoon before lake effect snow moves back south across the area Saturday night and early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds and heavy snow could bring down tree branches and result in isolated power outages. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4264 7797 4296 7792 4298 7833 4289 7881 4275 7888 4227 7975 4208 7975 4216 7942 4247 7892 4251 7823 TIME Y22M11D18T1800Z-Y22M11D19T0000Z COORD...4291 7798 4310 7843 4306 7895 4281 7887 4259 7911 4227 7975 4212 7978 4244 7890 4252 7834 4263 7809 TIME Y22M11D19T0000Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z COORD...4312 7837 4312 7845 4336 7848 4336 7866 4328 7903 4298 7902 4297 7890 4279 7887 4278 7878 4297 7845 TIME Y22M11D19T1200Z-Y22M11D20T0000Z COORD...4314 7819 4312 7845 4334 7845 4338 7859 4328 7903 4309 7906 4279 7887 4278 7848 4286 7847 4288 7817 TIME Y22M11D20T0000Z-Y22M11D20T1200Z COORD...4314 7819 4308 7873 4303 7883 4304 7901 4298 7902 4294 7891 4279 7887 4278 7848 4286 7847 4288 7817 TIME Y22M11D20T1200Z-Y22M11D20T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
